headline: Warren Buffett Sells $168M in DaVita Inc. (DVA) Shares
summary: According to a Form 4 filing with the United States Securities and Exchange Commission, on May 8, Berkshire Hathaway sold 1,145,938 shares of DaVita Inc. (NYSE:DVA), valued at $168.58 million. The move occurred just a day before a union health benefits fund sued top dialysis services providers in the country, including DaVita Inc. (NYSE:DVA), for […]
